Functions.html#/c:@F@MySQLCharsetForEnco.name: MySQLCharsetForEncoding
Functions.html#/c:@F@MySQLCharsetForEnco.abstract: Parses input parameters and returns appropriate character set string.

Functions.html#/c:@F@NSStringEncodingFro.name: NSStringEncodingFromCharsetEncoding
Functions.html#/c:@F@NSStringEncodingFro.abstract: Converts library’ encoding to the Cocoa encoding.

Protocols/OHMySQLMappingProtocol.html#/c.name: -mappingDictionary
Protocols/OHMySQLMappingProtocol.html#/c.abstract: Dictionary that represents class’ properties with table’ column names.

Protocols/OHMySQLMappingProtocol.html#/c.name: -mySQLTable
Protocols/OHMySQLMappingProtocol.html#/c.abstract: Table where current entity can be found.

Enums/OHResultErrorType.html#/c:@E@OHRes.name: OHResultErrorTypeSync
Enums/OHResultErrorType.html#/c:@E@OHRes.abstract: Commands were executed in an improper order.

Enums/OHResultErrorType.html#/c:@E@OHRes.name: OHResultErrorTypeLost
Enums/OHResultErrorType.html#/c:@E@OHRes.abstract: The connection to the server was lost during the query.

Enums/OHResultErrorType.html#/c:@E@OHRes.name: OHResultErrorTypeUnknownCode
Enums/OHResultErrorType.html#/c:@E@OHRes.abstract: An unknown error code received. Look at debug console.

Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.name: OHRefreshOptionGrant
Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.abstract: Refresh the grant tables, like FLUSH PRIVILEGES.

Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.name: OHRefreshOptionTables
Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.abstract: Flush the table cache, like FLUSH TABLES.

Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.name: OHRefreshOptionHosts
Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.abstract: Flush the host cache, like FLUSH HOSTS.

Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.name: OHRefreshOptionSlave
Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.abstract: On a slave replication server, reset the master server information and restart the slave, like RESET SLAVE.

Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.name: OHRefreshOptionMaster
Enums/OHRefreshOption.html#/c:@E@OHRefre.abstract: On a master replication server, remove the binary log files listed in the binary log index and truncate the index file, like RESET MASTER.

Enums/OHProtocolType.html#/c:@E@OHProtoc.name: OHProtocolTypeTCP
Enums/OHProtocolType.html#/c:@E@OHProtoc.abstract: TCP/IP connection to local or remote server.

Enums/OHProtocolType.html.name: OHProtocolType
Enums/OHProtocolType.html.abstract: Represents protocol types that can be used during session.

Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinInner.name: OHJoinInner
Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinInner.abstract: INNER JOIN type for combining records from two tables.

Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinRight.name: OHJoinRight
Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinRight.abstract: RIGHT JOIN type for performing a join starting with the second (right-most) table and then any matching first (left-most) table records.

Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinLeft.name: OHJoinLeft
Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinLeft.abstract: LEFT JOIN type for performing a join starting with the first (left-most) table and then any matching second (right-most) table records.

Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinFull.name: OHJoinFull
Constants.html#/c:@OHJoinFull.abstract: FULL JOIN type for all matching records from both tables whether the other table matches or not.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: mysql
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: Nonnull after connection with DB. You don’t need to use this property at all.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: connected
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: Pings the server and indicates whether the connection to the server is working.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: protocol
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: One of the protocols. Needs to be set before calling -connect.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: encoding
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: The default character set for the current connection. By default UTF-8.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: -reconnect
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: Attempts to disconnect and then establish a connection to a MySQL database engine. Also tries establish SSL connection if it is specified.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: -connect
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: Attempts to establish a connection to a MySQL database engine. Also tries establish SSL connection if it is specified.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: -shutdown
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: Asks the database server to shut down. The connected user must have the SHUTDOWN privilege.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: -refresh:
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: Flushes tables or caches, or resets replication server information. The connected user must have the RELOAD privilege.

Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.name: -pingMySQL
Classes/OHMySQLStoreCoordinator.html#/c:.abstract: Checks whether the connection to the server is working. If the connection has gone down and auto-reconnect is enabled an attempt to reconnect is made.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html#.name: +SELECTFirst:condition:
Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html#.abstract: Select the first record of the selected table.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html#.name: +SELECTFirst:condition:orderBy:ascending:
Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html#.abstract: Select the first record of the selected table.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html#.name: +JOINType:fromTable:columnNames:joinOn:
Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html#.abstract: Combines rows from two or more tables, based on a common field between them.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithParentQueryContext:
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.abstract: Initializes a context with a given parent context.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.name: storeCoordinator
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.abstract: Should be set before using the class.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.name: insertedObjects
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.abstract: The set of objects that have been inserted into the context but not yet saved in a persistent store.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.name: updatedObjects
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.abstract: The set of objects that have been updated into the context but not yet saved in a persistent store.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.name: deletedObjects
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.abstract: The set of objects that have been deleted into the context but not yet saved in a persistent store.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.name: -executeQueryRequestAndFetchResult:error:
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.abstract: Executes a query and returns result. This method is the most applicable for SELECT queries.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.name: -saveToPersistantStore:
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html#/c:objc.abstract: Saves to MySQL store asynchronously in global queue.

Classes/OHMySQLContainer.html#/c:objc(cs.name: mainQueryContext
Classes/OHMySQLContainer.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Single context that is used in the app. Context should be set by a user of this class.

Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.name: key
Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.abstract: The path name to the key file.

Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.name: certPath
Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.abstract: The path name to the certificate file.

Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.name: certAuthPath
Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.abstract: The path name to the certificate authority file.

Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.name: certAuthPEMPath
Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.abstract: The path name to a directory that contains trusted SSL CA certificates in PEM format.

Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.name: cipher
Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.abstract: A list of permissible ciphers to use for SSL encryption.

Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.name: -initWithKey:certPath:certAuthPath:certAuthPEMPath:cipher:
Classes/OHSSLConfig.html#/c:objc(cs)OHSS.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated SSL config object with the specified parameters.

Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.name: serverInfo
Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.abstract: Returns a string that represents the MySQL server version; for example, “5.7.14”.

Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.name: hostInfo
Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.abstract: Returns a string describing the type of connection in use, including the server host name.

Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.name: protocolInfo
Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.abstract: An unsigned integer representing the protocol version used by the current connection.

Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.name: serverVersion
Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.abstract: An integer that represents the MySQL server version. For example, “5.7.14” is returned as 50714.

Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.name: status
Classes/OHMySQLStore.html#/c:objc(cs)OHM.abstract: A character string describing the server status. nil if an error occurred.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html#/c:obj.name: serializationDuration
Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html#/c:obj.abstract: The time when the serialization was completed.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html#/c:obj.name: queryDuration
Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html#/c:obj.abstract: The time interval from the time the request started to the time the request completed.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html#/c:obj.name: totalTime
Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html#/c:obj.abstract: The time interval in seconds from the time the request started to the time response serialization completed.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: username
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: Can be up to 16 characters long. Operating system user names may be of a different maximum length.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: serverName
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: A host name or an IP address.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: dbName
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: The string specifies the name of database.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: socket
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: If it is not NULL, the string specifies the socket or named pipe to use.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: port
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: If it is not 0, the value is used as the port number for the TCP/IP connection.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: sslConfig
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: Used for establishing secure connections using SSL.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithUser:password:serverName:dbName:port:socket:
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated object.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithUser:password:sslConfig:serverName:dbName:port:socket:
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html#/c:obj.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated object.

Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html.name: OHMySQLConfiguration
Classes/OHMySQLConfiguration.html.abstract: The entity that has authority to use a store MySQL.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequest.html.name: OHMySQLQueryRequest
Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequest.html.abstract: An instance of OHMySQLQueryRequest describes SQL query used to retrieve data from a MySQL store.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html.name: OHMySQLQueryTimeline
Classes/OHMySQLQueryTimeline.html.abstract: An instance of OHMySQLTimeline represents lifecycle of the query.

Classes/OHMySQLStore.html.name: OHMySQLStore
Classes/OHMySQLStore.html.abstract: An object of this class contains details about a store MySQL.

Classes/OHSSLConfig.html.name: OHSSLConfig
Classes/OHSSLConfig.html.abstract: This class is used for establishing secure connections using SSL.

Classes/OHMySQLContainer.html.name: OHMySQLContainer
Classes/OHMySQLContainer.html.abstract: Represents a main context and store coordinator.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html.name: OHMySQLQueryContext
Classes/OHMySQLQueryContext.html.abstract: An instance of this class is responsible for executing queries, saving/updating/deleting objects.

Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html.name: OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory
Classes/OHMySQLQueryRequestFactory.html.abstract: Convenience class for making specific OHMySQLQueryRequest instances.

Categories/NSString%28Escaping%29.html#/.name: -escapedUsingEncoding:
Categories/NSString%28Escaping%29.html#/.abstract: The method creates a legal SQL string for use in an SQL statement.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
